title: Columns
text: file contains locality-specific physician fee schedule payment amounts services covered Medicare Physician Fee Schedule (MPFS) one record unique combination carrier, locality, procedure code modifier. mac Carrier Number Medicare Administrative Contractor ID locality Locality Pricing Locality ID hcpcs HCPCS Code HCPCS Code mod Modifier Diagnostic Tests, NA denotes Global Service, Mods 26 & TC identify Components. Mod 53 indicates Separate RVUs & PFS Amount Procedures Terminated Completion. status Status Code Indicates Fee Schedule, Covered, Separately Payable. , R T used Medicare payment. mult_surg Multiple Surgery Indicator Indicates Applicable Payment Adjustment Rule: Mod 51 flat_vis Flat Rate Visit Fee Contains Flat Visit Fee Primary Care First Model nther Non-Facility Therapy Reduction Fee reflects 50% PE payment Non-facility services fther Facility Therapy Reduction Fee reflects 50% PE payment Facility services fee_nf Non-Facility Fee Schedule Amount Non-Facility Pricing Amount fee_f Facility Fee Schedule Amount Facility Pricing Amount opps OPPS Indicator OPPS Payment Cap Determination: 1 = Applies, 9 = Apply opps_nf OPPS Non-Facility OPPS Capped Non-Facility Pricing Amount opps_f OPPS Facility OPPS Capped Facility Pricing Amount
code: northstar:::col_lb("md", "pfs") |>    gt(rowname_col = "var") |>   gt_style()

title: Columns
text: file contains information services covered Medicare Physician Fee Schedule (MPFS) 2024. 10,000 physician services, file contains associated relative value units (RVUs), fee schedule status indicator, various payment policy indicators needed payment adjustment (.e., payment assistant surgery, team surgery, bilateral surgery, etc.). Medicare physician fee schedule amounts adjusted reflect variation practice costs area area. geographic practice cost index (GPCI) established every Medicare payment locality three components procedure’s relative value unit (.e., RVUs work, practice expense, malpractice). GPCIs applied calculation fee schedule payment amount multiplying RVU component times GPCI component. hcpcs HCPCS Code HCPCS Code description Description HCPCS Procedure Description mod Modifier Diagnostic Tests, NA denotes Global Service, Mods 26 & TC identify Components. Mod 53 indicates Separate RVUs & PFS Amount Procedures Terminated Completion. status Status Code Indicates Fee Schedule, Covered, Separately Payable. , R T used Medicare payment. wrvu Work RVU RVUs Physician Work nprvu Non-Facility Practice Expense RVU RVUs Non-Facility Practice Expense fprvu Facility Practice Expense RVU RVUs Facility Practice Expense mrvu Malpractice RVU RVUs Malpractice Expense cf Conversion Factor Multiplier Transforms RVUs Payment Amounts nprvu_opps Non-Facility PE Used OPPS Payment Amount Non-Facility Practice Expense RVUs OPPS Payment fprvu_opps Facility PE Used OPPS Payment Amount Facility Practice Expense RVUs OPPS Payment global Global Days Number Global Days op_ind Operative Percentage Indicator 1 = percentages, 0 = percentages op_pre Preoperative Percentage Preoperative % Global Package op_intra Intraoperative Percentage Intraoperative % Global Package, including Postoperative Work Hospital op_post Postoperative Percentage Postoperative % Global Package, Provided Office, Post-Discharge pctc PCTC Indicator PCTC Payment Adjustment mult_proc Multiple Procedure Indicator Multiple Procedures (Mod 51) Payment Adjustment surg_bilat Bilateral Surgery Indicator Bilateral Procedure (Mod 50) Payment Adjustment surg_asst Assistant Surgery Indicator Assistant Surgery (Mods 80, 81, 82, ) Payment Adjustment surg_co Co-Surgery Indicator Co-surgeons (Mod 62) Payment Adjustment surg_team Team Surgery Indicator Team Surgeons (Mod 66) Payment Adjustment endo Endoscopic Base Code Endoscopic Base Code HCPCS Multiple Surgery indicator 3 supvis Physician Supervision Indicator Physician Supervision Level Required Service dximg Diagnostic Imaging Family Indicator Diagnostic Service Family HCPCS Multiple Procedure indicator 4 unused Used Medicare Payment Whether Code used Medicare Payment rare Rarely/Never Performed Procedure rarely/never performed : 00 (Neither), 01 (Facility), 10 (Non-Facility), 11 ()
code: northstar:::col_lb("md", "rvu") |>    gt(rowname_col = "var") |>   gt_style()

code: dplyr::tibble(mod = c("26", "TC", "53")) |>    case_modifier(mod) |>   gt(rowname_col = "mod") |>    tab_header(title = md(modtitle)) |>    tab_footnote(f53, locations = cells_stub(rows = 3)) |>    tab_footnote(fmod) |>    gt_style()

title: Columns
text: Active Payment Bundle Carrier Priced Deleted Codes Regulatory Exclusion Deleted/Discontinued Valid Medicare Anesthesia Service Measurement Code Restricted Coverage Non-Covered Service Bundled/Excluded Code Injections Statutory Exclusion
code: dplyr::tibble(   code = sort(c("A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "F", "I", "M", "R", "N", "J", "P", "T", "X"))) |>    case_status(code) |>    gt(rowname_col = "code") |>    tab_header(title = md("Indicates whether the code is in the fee schedule and whether it is separately payable if the service is covered. Only RVUs associated with status codes of **A**, **R**, or **T**, are used for Medicare payment.")) |>    tab_style(     style = cell_fill(color = "yellow", alpha = 0.3),     locations = cells_body(       columns = everything(),       rows = c(1, 12, 13))) |>    gt_style()

title: Columns
text: file contains Geographic Practice Cost Index (GPCI) component carrier/locality 2024 well locality/county crosswalk. GPCI reflects relative costs physician work, practice expense, malpractice insurance geographic area compared national average costs component.
code: gpci() |> select(-counties) |> gt(rowname_col = "mac", groupname_col = "state") |> tab_stubhead(label = "State | MAC") |> cols_label( mac = "MAC", state = "State", locality = "Locality", name = "Name", wgpci = "Work", pgpci = "Practice", mgpci = "Malpractice", two_macs = "Two MACs") |> cols_merge( columns = c(locality, name), pattern = "{1}<< {2}>>") |> cols_align(align = "left") |> opt_all_caps() |> fmt_number( decimals = 3, drop_trailing_zeros = TRUE) |> tab_footnote( footnote = "MAC assignments as of November 22, 2023", locations = cells_stubhead()) |> tab_footnote( footnote = md("Work GPCI reflects a 1.5 floor in Alaska established by [**MIPPA**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medicare_Improvements_for_Patients_and_Providers_Act_of_2008)."), cells_body(columns = locality, rows = 1)) |> tab_footnote( footnote = "PE GPCI reflects a 1.0 floor for Frontier States established by the ACA.", cells_body( columns = locality, rows = c(68, 70, 81, 91, 109))) |> tab_footnote( footnote = md("**Note**: The *Further Continuing Appropriations and Other Extensions Act, 2024* (Section 501) extended the 1.0 Work GPCI floor through January 19, 2024. Therefore, the Work GPCIs for 2023 reflect the 1.0 Work GPCI floor. Work GPCIs for 2024 are shown both with and without a 1.0 floor and Work GPCIs for 2025 do not reflect a 1.0 floor.")) |> tab_style( style = cell_text(align = "center", size = px(14)), locations = cells_stub()) |> tab_options( table.font.size = px(14), table.width = pct(100), heading.title.font.size = px(16), heading.subtitle.font.size = px(16), heading.align = "left", source_notes.font.size = px(16), row_group.as_column = TRUE) |> gt_marks(cols = c(two_macs))

description_clinician = purrr::map(       description_clinician, ~paste0("* ", ., collapse = "\n"))) |>   tidyr::unnest(cols = description_clinician) |>   dplyr::ungroup() |> title: Fee Schedule
text: Participating amount calculated follows:  \[x = [(RVU_w \times GPCI_w) + (RVU_p \times GPCI_p) + (RVU_m \times GPCI_m)] \times CF\]  Non-participating amount calculated follows:  \[ y = 0.95x\]  Limiting charge calculated follows:  \[ z = 0.95(1.15x)\]
code: calculate_amounts(   wrvu  = 6.26,   nprvu = 7.92,   fprvu = 4.36,   mrvu  = 0.99,   cf    = 32.744,   wgpci = 1,   pgpci = 0.883,   mgpci = 1.125 ) #> Facility Amounts: #>  #> RVU Total ............ 11.22 #> Participating ........ $367.51 #> Non-Particpating ..... $349.13 #> Limiting Charge ...... $401.50 #>  #> Non-Facility Amounts: #>  #> RVU Total ............ 14.37 #> Participating ........ $470.44 #> Non-Particpating ..... $446.91 #> Limiting Charge ...... $513.95

what: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calculate_amounts
title: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calculate_amounts
text: ((wRVU x wGPCI) + (pRVU x pGPCI) + (mRVU x mGPCI)) x Conversion Factor

title: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calculate_amounts
code: calculate_amounts(wrvu, fprvu, nprvu, mrvu, wgpci, pgpci, mgpci, cf = 32.7442)

title: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calculate_amounts
text: wrvu < double > Work RVU fprvu < double > Facility Practice Expense RVU nprvu < double > Non-Facility Practice Expense RVU mrvu < double > Malpractice RVU wgpci < double > Work GPCI pgpci < double > Practice Expense GPCI mgpci < double > Malpractice GPCI cf < double > Conversion Factor, default 32.7442

title: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calculate_amounts
text: Facility & Non-Facility Participating, Non-Participating & Limiting Charge Amounts

title: Calculate Physician Fee Schedule Payment Amounts — calculate_amounts
code: calculate_amounts(wrvu  = 6.26,                   nprvu = 7.92,                   fprvu = 4.36,                   mrvu  = 0.99,                   wgpci = 1.053,                   pgpci = 0.883,                   mgpci = 1.125,                   cf    = 32.7442) #> Facility Amounts: #>  #> RVU Total ............ 11.56 #> Participating ........ $378.37 #> Non-Particpating ..... $359.45 #> Limiting Charge ...... $413.37 #>  #> Non-Facility Amounts: #>  #> RVU Total ............ 14.70 #> Participating ........ $481.30 #> Non-Particpating ..... $457.24 #> Limiting Charge ...... $525.82

title: CARCs & RARCs — carc_rarc
text: Claim Adjustment Reason Codes (CARCs) Remittance Advice Remark Codes (RARCs)

title: CARCs & RARCs — carc_rarc
code: carc_rarc()

title: CARCs & RARCs — carc_rarc
text: dplyr::tibble()

title: CARCs & RARCs — carc_rarc
text: X12 External Code Source 139 codes describe claim service line paid differently billed generally assign responsibility adjustment amounts. format always two alpha characters. Claim Adjustment Group Codes (e.g., PR, OA) internal X12 standard.

title: CARCs & RARCs — carc_rarc
text: X12 External Code Source 411 codes provide additional explanation adjustment already described Claim Adjustment Reason Code (CARC) convey information remittance processing. Remittance Advice Remark Codes (RARCs) used provide additional explanation adjustment already described Claim Adjustment Reason Code (CARC) convey information remittance processing. two types RARCs, supplemental informational. majority RARCs supplemental; generally referred RARCs without distinction. Supplemental RARCs provide additional explanation adjustment already described CARC. second type RARC informational; RARCs  prefaced Alert: often referred Alerts. Alerts used convey information remittance processing never related specific adjustment CARC.

title: CARCs & RARCs — carc_rarc
code: carc_rarc()$group #> # A tibble: 5 × 2 #>   code  description                #>   <chr> <chr>                      #> 1 CO    Contractual Obligations    #> 2 CR    Corrections and Reversals  #> 3 OA    Other Adjustments          #> 4 PI    Payer Initiated Reductions #> 5 PR    Patient Responsibility

title: Recoding Functions — cases
text: Various recoding functions Identifies applicable Diagnostic Service family HCPCS codes Multiple Procedure indicator 4. field use post payment review. Modifier 66: Services Team Surgeons may paid Modifier 50: Indicates services subject payment adjustment Modifier 51: Indicates applicable payment adjustment rule multiple procedures Modifier 62: Services two surgeons, different specialty, may paid. Fee schedule amount equals 16 percent amount otherwise applicable surgical payment.

title: Recoding Functions — cases
code: case_section(df, col)  case_section_cpt(df, col)  case_section_hcpcs(df, col)  case_level(df, col)  case_category(df, col)  case_global(df, col)  case_imaging(df, col)  case_supervision(df, col)  case_team(df, col)  case_bilateral(df, col)  case_multproc(df, col)  case_cosurg(df, col)  case_assistant(df, col)  case_opps(df, col)  case_modifier(df, col)  case_pctc(df, col)  case_status(df, col, desc = FALSE)  case_asc(df, col)  case_coverage(df, col)  case_pricing(df, col)  case_multiple_pricing(df, col)  case_labcert(df, col)  case_tos(df, col)

title: Calculate Limiting Charge — limiting_charge
text: Medicare limiting charge set law 115% payment amount service furnished Non-participating physician.

title: Calculate Limiting Charge — limiting_charge
code: limiting_charge(par_amount)

title: Calculate Limiting Charge — limiting_charge
text: par_amount < double > Participating Amount

title: Calculate Limiting Charge — limiting_charge
text: numeric vector Limiting Charge Amount

title: Calculate Limiting Charge — limiting_charge
text: However, law sets payment amount Non-participating physicians 95% payment amount Participating physicians (.e., fee schedule amount). Calculating 95% 115% amount equivalent multiplying amount factor 1.0925 (109.25%). Therefore, calculate Medicare limiting charge physician service locality, multiply fee schedule amount factor 1.0925. result Medicare limiting charge service locality fee schedule amount applies.

title: Calculate Limiting Charge — limiting_charge
code: limiting_charge(26.35) #> [1] 28.78738

title: Restructured BETOS Classification for HCPCS — rbcs
text: hcpcs < character > HCPCS code category < character > RBCS Category: Procedure (n = 6920) Test (n = 3015) DME (n = 2971) Treatment (n = 1795) Imaging (n = 1097) E&M (n = 695) Anesthesia (n = 307) (n = 233) subcategory < character > RBCS Subcategory (53 unique total) family < character > RBCS Family (178 unique total) procedure < character > Procedure Type: Major (n = 3676) Non-Procedure (n = 10113) (n = 3244) limit_cols < logical > Limit Columns

title: Restructured BETOS Classification for HCPCS — rbcs
text: tibble columns:

title: Restructured BETOS Classification for HCPCS — rbcs
text: Restructured BETOS Classification System (RBCS) taxonomy allows researchers group Medicare Part B healthcare service codes clinically meaningful categories subcategories. Based original Berenson-Eggers Type Service (BETOS) classification created 1980s, includes notable updates Part B non-physician services undergoes annual updates technical expert panel researchers clinicians. general framework grouping service codes new RBCS taxonomy largely follows structure BETOS. Like BETOS, RBCS groups HCPCS codes categories, subcategories, families – categories aggregate level families granular level. Medicare Part B service codes, including non-physician services, assigned 6-character RBCS taxonomy code.

title: Restructured BETOS Classification for HCPCS — rbcs
text: Restructured BETOS Classification System RBCS Data Dictionary

title: Restructured BETOS Classification for HCPCS — rbcs
text: Annually

title: Restructured BETOS Classification for HCPCS — rbcs
code: rbcs(hcpcs = c("J9264", "39503", "43116", "33935", "11646")) |> dplyr::glimpse() #> Rows: 5 #> Columns: 5 #> $ hcpcs            <chr> "11646", "33935", "39503", "43116", "J9264" #> $ rbcs_category    <chr> "Procedure", "Procedure", "Procedure", "Procedure", "… #> $ rbcs_subcategory <chr> "Skin", "Cardiovascular", "Other Organ Systems", "Dig… #> $ rbcs_family      <chr> "Skin Lesion Excision", "No RBCS Family", "No RBCS Fa… #> $ rbcs_procedure   <chr> "Other", "Major", "Major", "Major", "Non-Procedure"

title: 2024 National Physician Fee Schedule Relative Value File — rvu
code: rvu(c("A0021", "V5362", "J9264", "G8916")) |> dplyr::glimpse() #> Rows: 4 #> Columns: 28 #> $ hcpcs       <chr> "A0021", "G8916", "J9264", "V5362" #> $ description <chr> "Outside state ambulance serv", "Pt w iv ab given on time"… #> $ mod         <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA #> $ status      <chr> "I", "X", "E", "N" #> $ wrvu        <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ nprvu       <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ fprvu       <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ mrvu        <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ cf          <dbl> 32.744, 32.744, 32.744, 32.744 #> $ nprvu_opps  <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ fprvu_opps  <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ mrvu_opps   <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ global      <chr> "XXX", "XXX", "XXX", "XXX" #> $ op_ind      <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ op_pre      <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ op_intra    <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ op_post     <dbl> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ pctc        <chr> "9", "9", "9", "9" #> $ mult_proc   <chr> "9", "9", "9", "9" #> $ surg_bilat  <chr> "9", "9", "9", "9" #> $ surg_asst   <chr> "9", "9", "9", "9" #> $ surg_co     <chr> "9", "9", "9", "9" #> $ surg_team   <chr> "9", "9", "9", "9" #> $ endo        <chr> NA, NA, NA, NA #> $ supvis      <chr> "09", "09", "09", "01" #> $ dximg       <chr> "99", "99", "99", "99" #> $ unused      <int> 0, 0, 0, 0 #> $ rare        <chr> "00", "00", "00", "00"
